content.query:
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[UpsertEntities]    Script Date: 05-12-2021 11:37:47 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO

SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO


ALTER PROC [dbo].[UpsertEntities] AS
BEGIN
Update
de
SET
  de.claimid = ld.claimid
, de.category= ld.category
, de.text= ld.text
FROM dbo.Entities de 
INNER JOIN  Load.Entities ld ON ld.claimid = de.claimid and ld.category=de.category and ld.text=de.text


Insert INTO dbo.Entities 
(
	claimid
,	category
,	text
)

SELECT
	ld.claimid
,	ld.category
,	ld.text
FROM Load.Entities ld
LEFT JOIN dbo.Entities de ON ld.claimid = de.claimid and ld.category=de.category and ld.text=de.text
WHERE de.claimid is null

END

GO
